name: Decibel Meter, DURFICST Sound Level Meter, Portable Level Meter, dB/SONE Units Fast Switching, with LCD Colour Screen, Backlight, A/C Counterweight, Sound meter for home and construction sites
short_description: 【Accurate/Fast Measurement】The MAX mode of the decibel meter displays the maximum/minimum value of the sound in the area, and the real-time monitoring function provides you with real-time data of the sound level in the area. The decibel meter also has a fast and slow response speed conversion function, and the detection error is only ±1.5dB. The fast response is 0.0125/s, which is suitable for ordinary environment measurement. The slow response is 0.1/s, which is used for environmental measurement with relatively large noise level changes.

【A/C Weighted Measurement Method】 A weighted simulates the frequency characteristics of low-intensity human ear noise, which is suitable for the detection of environmental noise. C weighted simulates the frequency characteristics of high-intensity human ear noise, which is suitable for the sound pressure analysis of machine motors and machines. Professional decibel meter, more professional measurement method to provide users with a more perfect use experience.

【Dual Unit Switching】 The sound level meter has two new measurement units: SONE/dB. The SONE mode is commonly used to detect the sound of musical instruments and the volume of performances, which is closer to the volume heard by the human ear. The dB mode is used for environmental noise detection in factories and homes, with a standard decibel range. At the same time, the decibel meter is also equipped with a windproof ball to reduce the noise caused by wind resistance.

【Humanized Function】 DURFICST decibel meter uses a three-color display to display volume changes. The screen functions include: battery reminder, volume detection, and different detection modes. The radio equipment is: 1/2-inch condenser microphone, and the detection is more professional. The decibel meter adopts a new mold one-piece molding process, with soft silicone on both sides, ergonomic design, making you feel more comfortable when using it.

【Convenient and Lightweight】 The decibel meter is lightweight and weighs only 205g. The product comes with a cloth bag for easy storage and carrying. DURFICST sound level meter is widely used for sound quality testing in factories, transportation, cars, baby rooms, sound system offices, as well as homes, schools and construction sites.

name: Digital Sound Level Meter,Sound Meter for Classroom Home Street,30-130dBA dB Meter to Measure Noise,Noise Decibel Reader,Audio Sound Tester,Sound Test equipmetent,Sound Measurement Device (30-130dBA)
short_description: 【Widely Used】The noise meter is the use of environmental sound level instrument, can be widely used in such as factories, workshops, schools, residential, office areas, traffic roads, audio and other occasions of sound level measurement. Also suitable for noise engineering, product quality control, health,prevention and control.
【Accurate Measurement】Measuring Range:30~130dB ;Accuracy:±1.5dB（94dB@1KHz）;Display Resolution:0.1dB
【A Weighted Measurement】 A Weighted network (automatic switching range display)
【Fast/Slow mode selection】Press the MODE key, you can convert the response speed of the noise meter, FAST fast, SLOW slow

【MAX/MIN Measurement】Press RANGE key to measure the maximum value of MAX and minimum value of MIN.A maximum duration of more than 3 seconds is recorded, with a normal test sampling rate of 0.5 seconds. The maximum error is ± 5%.
【Result Hold】The measurement result (HOLD) function;Press the HOLD key to hold the measured sound level value
【Sound level OVER or UNDER indicates】If the display displays "UNDER" or "OVER" characters, the sound level is lower than 30dB or higher than 130dB.
【LCD with backlight】After power-on, the backlight will automatically light up and turn off after 30 seconds. Press the backlight button to turn on the backlight.
【Automatic SHUTDOWN】3 minutes after the stop button, the meter will automatically shut down to save power.
【Low power indicator】 When the battery voltage decreases to a certain extent, the battery symbol in the upper right corner of the display will light up. In this case, the battery should be replaced.

name: Decibel Meter，Professional Digital Sound Level Meter (dB Meter) | SPL Meter for Accurate Noise Measurement | Sound Decibel Meter & Noise Detector with Wide Range LCD Display
short_description: professional digital decibel meter with lcd backlight display for clear readings in any lighting condition, perfect for environmental and industrial noise monitoring.
highly accurate noise decibel reader with data locking feature to track and analyze sound levels over time, ideal for professionals and home use.
portable lcd meter with easy-to-read digital level display, measuring sound from 30db to 130db for precise noise assessment anywhere.
Advanced sound level meter with data maximum and minimum locking function, perfect for detecting noise pollution in industrial fields or home decor projects.
compact and lightweight db meter with real-time noise measurement capability, delivering reliable decibel readings for environmental studies or workplace safety checks.

name: Decibel Meter, RISEPRO® Digital Sound Level Meter 30 – 130 dB Audio Noise Measure Device Backlight MAX/MIN, Data Hold Auto Power Off Dual Ranges HT-80A
short_description: USEFUL TOOL IN YOUR WORK & LIFE – This sound level meter is a great tool for checking, monitoring or controlling the sound level of any environments. It is widely applicable for personal, families, business, studies, industrial and etc.
WIDE RANGES & ACCURATE MEASUREMENT – It measures range from 30 – 130 dB with frequency range from 31.5 to 4Khz. Highly accurate with +/-1.5dB.
TIME WEIGHTING & FREQUENCY WEIGHTING – FAST(125mS) for time weighting. TYPE A for frequency weighting.

HOLD , MAX & MIN, AUTO POWER OFF, BACKLIT – Including all useful features such as data hold, max recorded reading and min recorded reading as well as auto power off. Backlit feature allows use of this meter in the dark.
GIFT BOX PACKAGE - Black carrying pouch and premium color gift box are come with the meter.

name: Decibel Meter, POROMETISTO SL01 Digital Sound Level Meter, 30-130dB SPL Meter with A/C Weighting, Data Hold, MAX/MIN – Noise Detector for Home, Factory, Noisy Neighbors (Black)
short_description: Precision Measurement: The POROMETISTO SL01 Decibel Meter delivers professional-grade accuracy ±1.5dB, a wide range of 30 dB to 130 dB, and 0.1dB resolution. Its 31.5Hz to 8kHz frequency range ensures reliable data for home theaters, noisy neighbors, or workplace safety.

A/C Weighting & Fast/Slow Response: The SL01 sound decibel meter switches between A-weighting which mimics human hearing for ambient noise and C-weighting which analyzes machinery/audio frequencies. This noise recorder chooses Fast (125ms) for sudden noise spikes or Slow (1000ms) for stable averages—perfect for monitoring Airbnb noise complaints or industrial inspections.

dB/SONE Unit & Durable: The SL01 spl meter toggle between dB and SONE units, tracks Max/Min values, and the Data Hold function. Includes auto-shutdown (cancellable) and low-battery alerts. This db meter is designed for durability with a shock-resistant rubber casing and portable handheld size.

Rugged Design & Broad Applications: Equipped with a precision condenser microphone and windproof ball, the SL01 noise decibel reader excels in harsh environments, such as construction sites, home theaters, or neighborhood noise disputes. This sound level meter is ideal for sound engineers, landlords, professionals, DIYers, and industrial noise inspections.
Complete Kit: This kit includes the SL01 Decibel Reader, 3x1.5V batteries, a screwdriver, a velvet bag, and a manual.

name: SW-525A Sound Level Meter Tester 30-130db Large Screen Red LCD Display Wall Hanging Type Decibel Noise Measuring with Alarm (Sound Level Meter)
short_description: Large Screen LCD Display
product_description: Purchase instructions: 1.The product is powered by USB cable, please confirm before purchase, you have USB socket applicable Product has no battery, it uses AC power supply 2.Usually in a very quiet room, the value will not be lower than 40dB, which is normal. Description: Large digital LCD display Measurement range is 30 ~ 130dB The indicator light blinks and buzzer Alarm Use the device to measure noises inside or outside. With hanging holes, can be hangged on the wall DC 5V 1A Type-C USB power supply Product size:22.8cm*12.5cm*3.2cm ，8.96in*4.91in*1.26in Specifications: Model: SW-525A Measurement range : 30 ~ 130dB (dB) Accuracy: +1.5 dB (reference sound pressure level, 94dB @ 1kHz) Frequency response: 31.5Hz ~ 8.5kHz frequency weighting: A Response time: Fast Microphone: 6mm condenser microphone Power supply: DC 5V 1A Type-C USB working environment: 0 - 40 degrees (32 degrees Fahrenheit to 104 degrees Fahrenheit), 10 - 80%RH Storage of Temp. and humidity: -10~60C. 10~70%RH Package Included: 1 x SW-525A sound level meter 1 x USB cable​ 1 x Manual Brand: TestHelper

name: PT6708 Sound Level Meter, Digital Decibel Reader Measurement, Range 30-130 dB, Accuracy 1.5dB Noise Meter with Large LCD Screen Display, Fast and Slow Selection (Batteries Include)
short_description: 【ACCURATE AND SENSITIVE DB METER】 High-quality AD636 chip, low power consumption, professional measurement. It can respond within 0.5s, and quickly display accurate measurement results. Our sound level meter utilizes an electric condenser microphone to monitor sound levels from 30 to 130 decibels at an accuracy of +/-1.5 dB with a 0.1 dB resolution.

【FAST AND SLOW MEASUREMENT】 The decibel gauge has the function of converting the fast and slow response rates. The fast response rate uses a time constant of 0.125s/time for general environmental measurement. The slow response rate uses a 1s/time constant, which is used for environmental measurements with relatively large changes in noise levels. Also, have MAX, data hold, and under/over, dB/SONE unit selection functions. Note: Can not keep and generate a report directly from the device.

【A/C WEIGHTING NETWORK SELECTION】 A weighting model: Simulate the characteristics of human hearing, which is suitable for the detection of ambient noise; C weighting mode: Actual sound level, which is suitable for the sound pressure analysis of machine motors and machines. This uses to measure the sound level of sound equipment in Work and Life: such as factories, workshops, schools, residential, office areas, traffic roads, audio, and other occasions. Also applies to noise engineering, product quality control, health control, and so on.

【ANTI-SLIP AND ENERGY-SAVING SPL METER】 The decibel gauge used a composite material injection molding process with an anti-drop structure design, power saving, high reliability, and high-efficiency circuit, easy to use in multi-environments. The Protmex noise meter with the backlight feature is appropriate for gathering sound data at night. To save power, the backlight auto power-off function is provided.

【Protmex 24/7 SUPPORT】 PT6708 sound meter complies with IEC651 Type 2 and SI.4 Type2. CE (LVE, EMC ), RoHS approved. We are engaged to bring quality products to more families and your choice and recognition will always be our greatest support. We will provide 7*24 online friendly support.

name: Decibel Meter, TopTes TS-501B Sound Level Meter with 2.25” Backlit LCD Screen, Portable SPL Tester with A/C Weighted, Range 30-130dB, MAX/MIN, Data Hold, Use for Home, Noisy Neighbor, Factory - Orange
short_description: Decibel Meter with A/C Weighting: TopTes TS-501B decibel meter uses a precise condenser microphone to capture sound. It’s equipped with A-weighting and C-weighting facilities that measure noise levels from 30 to 130 dB with an accuracy of 1.5 dB, Frequency from 30 to 8000Hz. Perfect for monitoring noise levels in communities, home theaters, audio systems, automobiles, workshops, schools, offices, factories

2.25-inch LCD Screen with Backlight: This TS-501B sound level meter is measured noise levels are expressed in decibels and displayed on the 2.25-inch LCD screen, it easy to read on a big display design. Long press the backlight button to turn on a backlight, making it easy to view even in damn light

MAX/MIN Measurement: The sound pressure level (SPL) meter has Max or Min measurement values to represent the maximum/minimum (high/low peak) value of the sound produced within a certain time, and the data hold function can freeze the current reading based on the sound measurement according to individual needs

Easy Use and Feature Packed: The non-slip side design ensures that the portable noise meter fits easily in the hand. TS-501B SPL meter is a battery-operated noise meter that comes with three durable batteries and has an automatic power off function to extend battery life. A low battery indicator will appear on the screen when the battery is low to remind the user to replace the battery in time

What’s in the Box: One TS-501B Decibel Meter, Three AAA Batteries, One User Manual, One Carry Case. The device has been factory calibrated to ensure high measurement accuracy and compliance with quality standards.

name: Decibel Meter Wall Hanging Sound Level Meter 11 inch Large LED Display Noise Temperature Humidity Meter with Alarm Icons Indicator Wide Applications for Classroom, Studio, Home, Factory
short_description: ✅【Large 11-inch LED Display】DANOPLUS decibel meter is equipped with 11 inches LED screen and brightness adjustable, you may see the real-time decibel level, Temperature and Humidity more clearly

✅【Face Icons Alarm】This noise decibel meter will automatically switch face icon alarm when the decibel at different level.【Green Icon】Less than 60dB;【Yellow Icon】60~75dB;【Orange Icon】75~85dB;【Red Icon】More than 85dB

✅【High Accuracy&Calibration】The noise meter has large measuring Range: 30~130dB with high accuracy: +/-1.5dB, and it features Calibration function, it's bale to recalibrate the devibel meter if the db reading is inaccurate after long-term usage
✅【User-Fridendly】DANOPLUS sound meter is designed with 2000mAh Lithium battery, 9.8 feet(300 cm) length USB cable for charging, no worry the USB cable is not length enough

✅【Wide Applications】This decibel meter sound level reader can be mounted on the wall or placed on destop, it's an ideal noise meter to measure the sound level in Classroom, Studio room, traffic routes, factories, construction site, home, offices, etc.
